00098

00113 #define CaptureDriverFlags  static_cast<JackPortFlags>(JackPortIsOutput | JackPortIsPhysical | JackPortIsTerminal | JackPortIsActive)
00114 #define PlaybackDriverFlags static_cast<JackPortFlags>(JackPortIsInput | JackPortIsPhysical | JackPortIsTerminal | JackPortIsActive)
00115 #define MonitorDriverFlags static_cast<JackPortFlags>(JackPortIsOutput | JackPortIsActive)
